EXT_DESCRIPTION.message: Quilt keeps your workspace tidy by automatically tiling your windows.

ONBOARDING_STEP_1.message: Any new browser windows you create will be automatically tiled according to your screen size and orientation.

ONBOARDING_STEP_2.message: Click the icon in the extension tray to refine the tiling rules or to turn off automatic tiling. Manually tile your windows anytime using the shortcut.

ONBOARDING_DONATE.message: Gifts are entirely optional but they do help me to continue creating free extensions. Thanks for your generosity!
